Description.$t: Learn how the play the Game!
Yep

Monica's frenemy Naomi is ruining her Prom fame. Make sure to bring Naomi down by either getting her to break up or cheat with her current boyfriend, get her to stop being friends with Monica, or get 2 people think she is less cool.
Oh No! The day of the Prom is approaching fast and Monica doesn't have a boyfriend to be Prom King. Monica will have to find a new boyfriend or else it will be the end of the World.
Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.
After Naomi's previous FAILED makeover, she must try again on new unpopular blood. Help Naomi complete her new makeover project.
In order to begin this popularity makeover, Naomi must gain the trust of the unfashionable Gunter. To stoop that low, she will have to become his friend, or even go as far as date him.
Under Naomi's wing, Gunter must go out and make enough friends in order to become the new popular kid in school.

Naomi's tutelage was going successfully, but a major error has occurred. Being friends with Edward is equivalent to social suicide. Something must be done. Gunter must leave this baggage behind on his own, or socially die trying.
Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.
We make story for Prom Week
Every king needs a queen. Zack is going to have to score a girlfriend that is totally cool before he stands a chance at becoming prom royalty.
Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.
Zack's a l33t dude, but even his friends say he's obnoxious. (His enemies say things we won't repeat here.) Can your deft social maneuvering crown this ubergeek the Prom King?

Getting crowned Prom King isn't just a popularity contest - it's also about playing the judges. Naomi's head of the Prom Committee, so if Zack wants that crown, he'd better make sure she understands how freaking cool he is.
Every king needs a queen. Zack is going to have to score a girlfriend that is totally cool before he stands a chance at becoming prom royalty.

OMG, it's the night of the Prom! Everyone looks swank and the air is thick with anticipation (or maybe just cheap cologne). Zack has one last chance to become the Prom King... but how many hearts must break along the way?

Rule.$c: - Magic checking who is Prom King?!

Levels.$c:
<Level title="Stand a chance..." timeLimit="10" endable="false">
					<Description>Zack is doomed as long as the popular kids despise him. Get the high school royalty to stop thinking of him as an enemy, and he's one step closer to stealing their crown.</Description>
					<Setting>neighborhood</Setting>
					<Cast>
						<CharacterName>Zack</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Simon</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Buzz</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Nicholas</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Chloe</CharacterName>
					</Cast>
					<GoalRules>
						<Rule>
							<Predicate type="relationship" first="Zack" second="Nicholas" relationship="enemies" negated="true" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
						</Rule>
						<Rule>
							<Predicate type="relationship" first="Zack" second="Buzz" relationship="enemies" negated="true" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
						</Rule>
					</GoalRules>
				</Level>

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %i%, you did it! You're the Prom %gender(i,King, Queen)%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But of course, %r%. Did you ever doubt me? I never doubted me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, there was that one time when %toc1%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Silence! My first act as king is to strip that from the yearbook record!
For my second act... I think somebody is getting an upgrade.
You know it, gigababe. You're now.... my tera-babe.
Come, my %gender(r,king,queen)%, let's wave to the little people...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: They look so small from over here...
Oh, %i%,  who would have thought the first time we met that one day we'd be crowned prom royalty!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... I couldn't say for both of us, but....
I'm the Prom %gender(i,King, Queen)%!  This is everything I ever wanted.
Except.... I always thought I'd have a Prom %if(0,princess)elseif(1,prince)elseif(3,king)else(queen)%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You will. There must be someone out there for you...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe that someone is closer than either of us realize.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%.  There are a million reasons to say no, and only one reason to say yes!

Rule.name: i is female, r is female
i is male, r is male
i is female, r is male

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'd like to thank everyone who helped make this moment possible, the Prom Selection Committee, my friends, %random(whoever invented proms back in the 1960s or whatever,the president of the United States,German expressionism,tofu products in general)%, %random(astronaut ice cream,Superman ice cream,the internet,the Academy)%, %random(the Police Academy,my barber,the circus,the dairy section at our local supermarket)%, %random(our high school,our team mascot,modern medicine,the letter Q)%...
And, uh, my parents and, of course, Mr. Al Garcia!  Thank you, good night!

Story.title: They're waiting for you, Gordon. In the TEST Chamber.

Description.$t: Funny that you'd show up today, Gordon. It's a Red Letter Day!

Oh, it's *you*... It's been a looong time. How have you been? I've been *really* busy being dead. You know, after you MURDERED me. Okay, look. We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret. But I think we can put our differences behind us. For Science. You Monster.

Cast.$c:
Note from GladOS: Place your testing subjects in the skeleton form below...
												  Simply increment the X value by 100, for each character you add.
												  Remember also to change storyLeadCharacter in the Story tag above to the first character below!

$c:
<Story title="Buzz Story">
		<Description>Completely devoid of any description whatsoever!</Description>
			<Levels>
				<Level title="Putting them in their Place" timeLimit="15" endable="false">
					<Description>Life is simple for Buzz. Being MVP of the football team and having a popular girlfriend was just given to him. However things are taking a turn for the worse, since now the geeks of the highschool are trying to bring Buzz down. Help Buzz bully Simon and Zack to put them in their place.</Description>
					<Setting>neighborhood</Setting>
					<Cast>
						<CharacterName>Buzz</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Simon</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Zack</CharacterName>
					</Cast>
					<GoalRules>
						<Rule>
							<Predicate type="relationship" first="Buzz" second="Zack" relationship="enemies" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="2" numTimesRoleSlot="initiator"/>
							<Predicate type="relationship" first="Buzz" second="Simon" relationship="enemies" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="2" numTimesRoleSlot="initiator"/>
						</Rule>
					</GoalRules>
				</Level>
				<Level title="Game Over!" timeLimit="20" endable="false">
					<Description>Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.</Description>
					<Setting>cornerstore</Setting>
					<Cast>
						<CharacterName>Zack</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Buzz</CharacterName>
					</Cast>
					<GoalRules>
							<Rule>
								<Predicate type="relationship" first="Zack" second="Monica" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
								<Predicate type="status" status="popular" first="Monica" second="" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
							</Rule>
					</GoalRules>
				</Level>
			</Levels>
		</Story>
REMEMBER, new tutorials also have to be declared in AuthoringLibrary.mxml

<Story title="Lesson 5: Achieving Your Goals" screenShot="gameplayBasics" storyLeadCharacter="Jordan" isTutorial="true" shouldDisplay="false">
		<Description>Become a highly successful Prom Player by pursuing goals like a pro.</Description>
			<ToDoList>
				<ToDoItem name="Jordan Makes Two Friends">
					<Condition>
						<Rule>
							<Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="responder" relationship="friends" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="2" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
						</Rule>
					</Condition>
				</ToDoItem>
				<ToDoItem name="Jordan Does Two Nice Things">
					<Condition>
						<Rule>
							<Predicate type="SFDB label" first="initiator" second="" label="cat: positive" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="true" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="2" numTimesRoleSlot="first"/>
						</Rule>
					</Condition>
				</ToDoItem>
				<ToDoItem name="Jordan Does Two Mean Things">
					<Condition>
						<Rule>
							<Predicate type="SFDB label" first="initiator" second="" label="cat: negative" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="true" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="2" numTimesRoleSlot="first"/>
						</Rule>
					</Condition>
				</ToDoItem>
				<ToDoItem name="Jordan Starts Dating">
					<Condition>
						<Rule>
							<Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="responder" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
						</Rule>
					</Condition>
				</ToDoItem>
			</ToDoList>
			<Levels>
				<Level title="Lesson 5: Achieving Your Goals" timeLimit="30" cameraZoom="1" useDefinedCameraPosition="false" cameraX="800" cameraY="1400" endable="false" isTutorial="true" shouldDisplay="false" tutorialScript="Tutorial5">
					<Description>Become a highly successful Prom Player by pursuing goals like a pro.</Description>
					<Setting>lockers</Setting>
					<Cast>
						<CharacterName>Jordan</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Doug</CharacterName>
						<CharacterName>Monica</CharacterName>
					</Cast>
					<GoalRules>
					</GoalRules>
				</Level>	
			</Levels>
		</Story>
